item.title: My Minimal VSCode Setup
item.description: Introduction VSCode has become the go-to code editor for many developers due to its versatility, performance, and extensive ecosystem of plugins. However, setting up the perfect environment can sometimes feel overwhelming with the sheer number of options available. In this post, I’ll share my minimal VSCode setup, including configurations and essential plugins that enhance my workflow without overwhelming it. Theme Choosing a theme that is easy on the eyes and enhances readability is crucial.
